title: Gretchen Rossi and fiance Slade Smiley dress as unicorns to celebrate baby Skylar's first Halloween
text:
She welcomed her daughter, Skylar Gray, three months ago.

And while sleep deprived, Gretchen Rossi ensured she still went all out for a matching family Halloween costume ensemble.

The 40-year-old beauty took to social media to document her transformation into a unicorn on Monday.

Scroll down for video

Everyone's involved! Gretchen Rossi enlisted her fiance Slade Smiley and their daughter Skylar Gray to all dress up as unicorns for their first family Halloween shoot together on Monday

Gretchen took to her stories to document her glam look complete with a makeup artist on hand.

The former Real Housewives of Orange County star stunned with a purple shadow and pink lip that brought out her striking blue eyes.

She completed the look with diamantes on her forehead and a purple wig to match.

It took a village! Gretchen took to her stories to document her glam look complete with a makeup artist on hand

Gretchen wore a lacy white off-the-shoulder dress that hugged her figure and showcased her incredible postpartum body just three months after welcoming her first child.

Her fiance Slade also got in on the fun, propping on a large unicorn horse head for the shoot.

And while Skylar didn't last too long in her ensemble, she too participated in an adorable full length costume complete with a hood head.

Love: Gretchen took to the social media to praise her fiance on Tuesday on his birthday while sharing the photos

Gretchen shared some of the photos on her Instagram on Tuesday to honor her long-term partner on his birthday.

Happy Birthday to the most amazing partner a girl could ever ask for @sladecbd (yes mine is tomorrow, we are a day apart),' she began.

'People are always asking us what is the secret to our relationship and these next few images and videos are the reason why we work so well together. Slade has always no matter what put my wants and needs first, he is game for all my crazy ideas and shenanigans and always does it with a joyful heart. (I.e. even dressing up as a huge rainbow unicorn head).'

Dedicated partner: 'Slade has always no matter what put my wants and needs first, he is game for all my crazy ideas and shenanigans and always does it with a joyful heart. (I.e. even dressing up as a huge rainbow unicorn head)'

Hilarious: 'He literally makes me laugh till it hurts almost every single day and he gives 100% of himself to every part of our relationship. Listen life isn’t perfect and of course we struggle with the hard stuff life sometimes throws at you, but we conquer it all head on, hand in hand, and with each other’s needs as our first priority'

'He literally makes me laugh till it hurts almost every single day and he gives 100% of himself to every part of our relationship. Listen life isn’t perfect and of course we struggle with the hard stuff life sometimes throws at you, but we conquer it all head on, hand in hand, and with each other’s needs as our first priority.'

She added that that was their secret to a longstanding relationship.

'That’s the secret... just always putting your partners needs before your own. You see everything else falls into place when you do that (Trust, loyalty, respect, love etc.).'

Adorable! And while Skylar didn't last too long in her ensemble, she too participated in an adorable full length costume complete with a hood head

Daddy to the rescue! Slade took off Skylar's outfit which made her seem slightly happier

Gretchen and Slade announced their engagement back in 2013, they are yet to set a date for their wedding.

'We’re really content. We’re really happy,' she told Us Weekly in February of their current relationship.

The pair went on a long road with in-vitro fertilization before announcing their pregnancy in late 2018.
description: Gretchen Rossi enlisted her husband Slade Smiley and their daughter Skylar Gray to all dress up as unicorns for their first family Halloween shoot together on Monday.
